mapper.sql: ID, DIR_NAME, PARENT_ID, ENABLED, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_ID, UPDATE_TIME, UPDATE_ID
mapper.insert: insert into t_directory (ID, DIR_NAME, PARENT_ID, ENABLED, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_ID, UPDATE_TIME, UPDATE_ID) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dirName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{enabled,jdbcType=BIT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into t_directory
ID,
DIR_NAME,
PARENT_ID,
ENABLED,
CREATE_TIME,
CREATE_ID,
UPDATE_TIME,
UPDATE_ID,

mapper.update:
update t_directory
DIR_NAME = #{dirName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PARENT_ID = #{parentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ENABLED = #{enabled,jdbcType=BIT},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATE_ID = #{createId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATE_ID = #{updateId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update t_directory set DIR_NAME = #{dirName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PARENT_ID = #{parentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ENABLED = #{enabled,jdbcType=BIT}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATE_ID = #{createId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_ID = #{updateId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select * from t_directory where 1=1
and enabled= true
select b.* from T_DIRECTORY_TEMPLATE_REF_DIRECTORY a inner join T_DIRECTORY b on a.DIR_ID = b.id where a.TPL_ID = #{templateId} and b.enabled=true

select c.* from T_DIRECTORY_TEMPLATE_CATEGORY a inner join T_DIRECTORY_TEMPLATE_CATEGORY_REF_DIRECTORY b on a.id = b.TPL_CATEGORY_ID inner join T_DIRECTORY c on b.DIR_ID = c.id where a.TPL_ID = #{templateId} and a.CATEGORY_ID = #{categoryId}
and b.REQUIRED = true
